ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: Computer application development student, currently in my final year of a bachelor's degree. Passionate about new technologies and creating innovative solutions. Thanks to my training and professional experience, I have acquired skills in web development, project management and technical support. Independent, motivated and curious, I am looking for my first job to apply my skills and enrich my expertise in the field.

experience.description: Development of a web application for managing deals related to floating or fixed-rate deposits, with monthly revaluation monitoring. Technologies used: C#, ASP.NET, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL Server, IIS, Microsoft Azure, jQuery, Ajax.

experience.title: Freelance
experience.description: Website development in HTML, CSS, and PHP, IT project management, and network configuration. Interacting with clients to understand their needs and provide technical support. Optimizing system performance and maintaining security.
